originalText.text: I truly appreciate Dr. Williams helping me with my medically fragile father. Dr. Williams is a great asset to this practice and to the neighborhood. All of the nurses have been kind, courteous and patient whenever my father had an appointment. This is the smallest Ryan medical center that I have been to but the health is  top-notch. The first time my father and I came here, a small child getting vaccinations in another room was screaming for dear life and all of the nurses handled it with professionalism and grace. I Highly recommend this center if you need a dedicated PCP!

originalText.text: This is a 4 stars LIE, I was wondering why the other Ryan Health centers got low reviews and this one is 4 stars. That was why I chose it. Waited 3 weeks for an appointment AND it was a complete WASTE of my time. I was recommended by an urgent care to go here but Honestly the doctor DID NOT say to go to this location, she recommended another, my dumb self chose this one after being mislead by the reviews. Never ever again, wished I would have gone to where I was recommended. Now I'm done with all Ryan Health centers.

originalText.text: I received my 2 COVID-19 vaccines at the Frederick Douglass Ryan Health Center.  Both times, I was impressed by the caring attitude of the staff and the respect shown to me during my time there.  I would like to express my gratitude to all, and especially to Marcus. Daniel and Joylene.  You guys are great!
